thread.title: Avengers: Infinity War - Chris Pratt's Star-Lord Revealed On Set
thread.title_full: Avengers: Infinity War - Chris Pratt's Star-Lord Revealed On Set

author: Jenna Anderson
title: Avengers: Infinity War - Chris Pratt's Star-Lord Revealed On Set
text:
Avengers: Infinity War - Chris Pratt's Star-Lord Revealed On Set Jenna Anderson - 02/10/2017 
Tonight, Robert Downey Jr. posted a Facebook live from the set of Avengers: Infinity War , and he brought a few friends along with him! 
In addition to the film's directors, Joe and Anthony Russo, RDJ unveiled two of his costars - Tom Holland, officially confirming that Spider-Man will appear in the film, and Chris Pratt , also known as Guardians of the Galaxy 's Star-Lord. 
Check out the video below, and watch for Pratt's appearance in his Star-Lord costume towards the end of the video!
